Name: Abst Clicker Farm
About the game: This is a game with numbers. By clicking on the button you accumulate a certain currency - clicks. Invest the accumulated amount in the effectiveness of each subsequent click and also get auto-click. Each improvement is worth a certain number of clicks. Thus, the more you spend on improvements, the faster and more you gain in the future. Not only clicks are tracked, but clicks are calculated per second. A kind of performance rating. A feature of the game is the so-called offline auto-click. While you are not in the game, your clicks continue to accumulate. - Accumulate clicks even when not playing.
